fails.label: R53
fails.info:
Possible solutions in order:
➜ Replace R53
➜ Replace U3
➜ Replace U1

fails.label: U3
fails.info:
Possible solutions in order:
➜ Retest – make sure the disc is placed properly in the tester (not under PCB)
➜ Replace U3

fails.label: Flag Check
fails.info:
Possible solutions in order:
➜ Shorts on small nodes by batteries
➜ Chamber IR LED/Photo diode misaligned (check if PD is bent)

fails.label: Battery Voltage
fails.info:
Possible solutions in order:
➜ Re-test using a different plate
➜ Batteries soldered incorrectly – open unit and reapply solder
➜ Batteries faulty – desolder batteries and send back to board tester

fails.label: 3.5v
fails.info:
Possible solutions in order:
➜ Re-test using a different plate
➜ RTV applied incorrectly on piezo disc – open unit and reapply RTV
➜ Piezo disc faulty – replace piezo disc and send back to board tester
